title: 15 Essential Products Our Readers Carted To Beat The January Blues
description: January is that curious month where our new-year ambitions collide with the reality of winter. Many of us started off with grand plans to transform our lives — whether it was working out more or finally committing to daily journaling — but when it’s freezing outside, staying bundled up on the couch suddenly feels like the more reasonable choice. The anonymous data gathered from our shopping stories shows that our readers also felt this tug-of-war between lofty aspirations and the urge to hibernate.Exhibit A: The surge in running shoes and workout clothes. Clearly, many of you were determined to keep moving despite the temptation to stay indoors (honestly, kudos). At the same time, skincare buys also saw a major uptick, signaling a collective resolve to invest in self-care during the colder, drier months. These shopping trends prove that the start of 2025 was as much about nurturing our goals as it was about embracing comfort. Read ahead for January’s shopping highlights — straight from you.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping and travel stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Mid Rise Ultra Barrel JeanBarrel-leg jeans have become a winter styling favorite — and January showed no signs of slowing that down. This silhouette is relaxed without looking overly slouchy, thanks to a fitted waist and tapered legs. With regular, short, and long inseam options, there's a perfect fit for everyone. Oh, and did we mention that Abercrombie’s denim sale is in full swing? Save big while you can.Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love Mid Rise Ultra Barrel Jean, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchThe Ordinary GF 15% SolutionOur readers can’t get enough of The Ordinary, and its latest skincare innovation is no exception. This serum is packed with plant-based GF (growth factors) — a type of peptide that promotes skin regeneration and firmness by boosting collagen production. Our UK beauty director, Jacqueline Kilikita, is exceedingly impressed by its high efficacy, delivered at this price point.The Ordinary GF 15% Solution, $, available at The OrdinaryZara Short Double Breasted CoatThis cropped, double-breasted jacket is an elegant wardrobe staple you’ll reach for winter after winter. Dress it up with a pleated mini and over-the-knee boots, or keep things low-key with a striped shirt and wide-leg jeans.Zara Short Double Breasted Coat, $, available at ZaraD.S. & Durga Pistachio Eau de ParfumPistachio was a standout pick from our 2025 trending perfume predictions. This scent isn’t your typical sweet gourmand. Instead, it opens with earthy patchouli before settling into a marzipan-like dry-down. In other words, a sophisticated take on dessert.D.S. & Durga Pistachio Eau de Parfum 50ml, $, available at NordstromLululemon Chargefeel 3 Workout ShoeA Lululemon bestseller for a reason, these sneakers are designed to handle whatever workout you throw at them by combining the cushioned bounce needed for running with ample support for cardio and strength training. The featherweight construction makes them just as ideal for casual strolls.Lululemon Chargefeel 3 Workout Shoe, $, available at LululemonPureology Hydrate ConditionerThis conditioner is the kind of hair care that makes you actually look forward to wash day. The creamy formula drenches color-treated ends in moisture, while green tea and sage keep the scalp balanced and healthy.Ulta Hydrate Conditioner, $, available at UltaGreyleigh Flannigan Task ChairIf upgrading your WFH setup has been on your list, consider this your sign: one of Wayfair’s top-reviewed home office chairs is now on sale. Reviewers love the luxe vegan leather finish and the fact that it stays comfortable for hours on end. Greyleigh Flannigan Polyurethane Task Chair, $, available at WayfairMadewell The Essential Curve Shoulder BagSuede handbags are everywhere and will continue their reign in 2025. Madewell’s slouchy take is peak versatile, pairing with everything from T-shirts and jeans to floral dresses.Madewell The Essential Curve Shoulder Bag, $, available at MadewellAestura Atobarrier365 CreamThis Korean moisturizer has been a winter lifesaver for my dry skin. Beyond the reasonable price point, what makes it special is the brand’s encapsulated ceramide technology — you can actually see tiny beads of moisture melt into your skin, creating a protective, calming layer. You’ll be tempted to slather it everywhere.Aestura Atobarrier 365 Cream, $, available at Soko GlamNordstrom Jacquard Pleat Back Maxi DressIs it loungewear? Is it an occasion dress? Why not both? This free-flowing maxi won big points from our readers for its rich jewel-green hue and roomy pockets. Nordstrom Jacquard Pleat Back Maxi Dress, $, available at NordstromLELO SilaIf you’re looking to start the year on a more pleasurable note, don’t let this LELO sale pass you by. This clitoral stimulator features low sonic vibrations and a wide opening designed to make knees buckle.LELO SILA, $, available at LELOUnder Armour UA Infinity 2.0 High Sports BraUnder Armour has cracked the code on a sports bra that offers high-impact support without digging in. The secret? Infinity-shaped padding that moves naturally with your body (crucial for those of us with bigger boobs), plus front-adjustable straps for an easy fit. The sale price makes it even sweeter.Under Armour UA Infinity 2.0 High Sports Bra, $, available at Under ArmourVictoria Beckham Beauty Satin Kajal LinerVictoria Beckham Beauty keeps the hits coming, but nothing has impressed our editors quite like the Satin Kajal Liner. Hydrating ingredients like chamomile and vitamin E give it a buttery glide, while the built-in smudger makes an undone smoky eye totally foolproof.Victoria Beckham Beauty Satin Kajal Liner, $, available at Victoria Beckham BeautyReformation Brooke Crop Cashmere Turtleneck SweaterThis black turtleneck has been dominating our readers’ Nordstrom shopping carts. Made from recycled cashmere, it keeps you toasty without bulky layers, while the ribbed details and boxy cut make it a forever favorite. Reformation Brooke Crop Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater, $, available at NordstromMedik8 Crystal Retinal 6 SerumThink of this as retinol’s gentler, faster-acting cousin. It delivers all the glow-boosting benefits — smoother texture, brighter complexion, firmer skin — without the irritation or dreaded purging courtesy of the faster-acting main ingredient: retinal. Our editors swear by it for battling winter dullness and uneven skin tone.Medik8 Crystal Retinal 6 Serum, $, available at Medik8Like what you see?
